Catalyst has a **Reward System** from the mod worshop.
- In-game rewards based on your progress.
- Total of 8 levels to gain high tier loot.
- To access the in-game progression system **`press J`** and level system will be shown to you.
- There are a total of `8 levels` you can reach, level 8 being the `highest loot` you can obtain with this reward system.
- If you press the `Level 1 button` at the top multiple times you can see all the `different loot` you may be able to get from just that level, **the same can be done with the other levels.**
- You will need `Zombie kills`, `Distance travelled`, `Players killed` and `Online time in-game`. You will see the `required amount` and the amount you currently have.

- Once you reach the requirement for a certain level you can `collect your reward` in the in-game reward system, it will `cycle through` all the loot in the one particular level and land on a random loot set, it will automatically `spawn in your inventory`.
